title: Will Working Become 'Optional' In 20 Years? Tech Billionaire Elon Musk Predicts BIG Change
description: Elon Musk stated that advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics will make working optional in less than 20 years and possibly even sooner. He acknowledged that some may doubt this prediction, noting that his statement may be played back after two decades to judge its accuracy.
content:
Tech billionaire and CEO of Tesla, Elon Musk, has predicted in an interview that in around 20 years, work may no longer be a necessity for people.

title: US-Based Firm Seeks Loan for Nvidia Chips for Use by Xiaohongshu
description: A US-based artificial intelligence firm is seeking a loan of about $300 million to help fund the purchase of advanced Nvidia Corp. chips for use in Japan by a Chinese client, according to people familiar with the matter, a rare case of financiers being tapped to support such deals.

title: Balanced level of humanised AI in chatbots enhances customer trust says GIM
